ch0352_40_taro/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you ready
for the Midnight Parade?
ch0352_40_taro/0101_0701_02_10: If not, I’ll pick out a cute costume for you!
ch0352_40_taro/7101_0701_01_10:
The Midnight Parade is a precious
opportunity to show off a different
kind of cute!
ch0352_40_taro/7101_0701_02_10:
Even I had trouble deciding what to wear
until the very last minute!
ch0352_40_taro/7101_0701_03_10:
But I was able to put together a cute
costume, so I’m super satisfied!
ch0352_40_taro/7102_0701_01_10:
My Whimsicott Terastallizes into the
Dark type!
ch0352_40_taro/7102_0701_02_10:
She’s got a cute face but is actually a bit of
a prankster, so it’s perfect for her!
ch0352_40_taro/7102_0701_03_10:
Terastallizing gives you options—not just in
battle but also in cuteness!
ch0352_40_taro/7103_0701_01_10:
I saw my daddy a while ago, and he told
me to have fun dressing in costume!
ch0352_40_taro/7103_0701_02_10: Hm? It’d be fun if Daddy dressed up, too?
ch0352_40_taro/7103_0701_03_10:
Hm... I wonder what costume would be cute
for him. Maybe...a Seismitoad?
ch0352_40_taro/7104_0701_01_10:
The Midnight Parade seems like a lot of fun
for Pokémon that’re usually kinda scary.
ch0352_40_taro/7104_0701_02_10:
You can tell Ghost- and Dark-type Pokémon
are in high spirits.
ch0352_40_taro/7104_0701_03_10:
It’s that difference from their usual that
makes them cute!
ch0352_40_taro/7105_0701_01_10:
Ta-da! I’ve some treats to share with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0352_40_taro/7105_0701_02_10:
On the day of the Midnight Parade, you can
get candy by winning battles.
ch0352_40_taro/7105_0701_03_10:
But it’s not healthy to eat too many sweets,
so I’m sharing mine with others!
ch0352_40_taro/1701_0701_02_10: Here! I wanted to share this with you!
ch0352_40_taro/1701_0702_01_10:
Look how cute it is! If it’s cute, you know it’s
gonna be strong!
ch0352_40_taro/2501_0701_01_10:
During the Midnight Parade, Pasio practically
overflows with cuteness!
ch0352_40_taro/2501_0701_02_10:
It could be fun to hold a Midnight Parade at
Blueberry Academy, too!
ch0352_40_taro/2501_0701_03_10: If we do, you should join us!
ch0352_40_taro/2501_0702_01_10:
Why not show off your own brand of cute
with a costume?
ch0352_40_taro/2501_0702_02_10:
Don’t worry! When it comes to finding
something cute, the possibilities are endless!
ch0352_40_taro/2511_0701_01_10:
Whimsicott’s cotton is the best! It’s so soft
and fluffy!
ch0352_40_taro/2511_0701_02_10:
If you bunch it up like a pillow and take a
nap, its softness and grassy scent’ll put you
right to sleep!
ch0352_40_taro/2511_0701_03_10:
Every home should have a Whimsicott!
You should, too!
ch0352_40_taro/2511_0702_01_10:
If you’re not careful, Whimsicott’s cotton will
get all over your room.
ch0352_40_taro/2511_0702_02_10:
But if you gather it up and make a plushie
out of it, it’ll be so cute!
ch0352_40_taro/3001_0701_01_10:
I was thinking hard about what costume to
wear... Then I realized it was already
morning!
ch0352_40_taro/3003_0701_01_10:
I get so sleepy around lunchtime. I wonder
if I should go take a nap with my Pokémon.
ch0352_40_taro/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s time for a parade! Let’s make sure to
enjoy it as much as we can!
